Sometimes, overly demanding toilet training may make children unable to relax the sphincters enough to completely empty the bladder. Incomplete voiding may also lead to UTIs.",NIDDK,Urinary Incontinence in Children
What are the treatments for Urinary Incontinence in Children ?,"Most UI fades away naturally as a child grows and develops and does not require treatment. When treatment is needed,
